subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Mark Martin was sitting in his office in Daytona Beach, Fla., three years ago surrounded by reporters and talking about what he thought was going to be his retirement from Nascar’s top series at the end of that season.
snippet: Mark Martin was sitting in his office in Daytona Beach, Fla., three years ago surrounded by reporters and talking about what he thought was going to be his retirement from Nascar’s top series at the end of that season.
